description.value:
Small handheld device that can plug into msot machines of human manufacture. Provides diagnostic information, detecftionof cracks or material fatigue, and other maintenance data. Provides +20 to Tech-Use Tests when diagnosing or repairing malfunctioning equipment.

Requirements

Techmarine Only

Effect: Distinguished

Notes: 25 R
